name: Ironpants
description:
Wanna play hard?! Ironpants - new arcade game by Applava is for you! Be the best and fly the longest distance with any of these heroes: Ironpants, Cutiepants, Chickenpants, Rocketpants, Bananapants, Crazypants, Discopants avoiding coming obstacles.

[CONTROLS]

Hold mode:
1. Hold your finger to go up.
2. Release your finger to go down.

Tap mode:
1. Tap to go up.

Survival mode:
1. Hold your finger to go up.
2. Release your finger to go down.

Voice mode:
1. Make any sound to go up.

Ironpants might be the hardest game you have ever played. Prove that your skills are made from iron! Be the best!
